Open tradeable packs


Use in paid evolutions


Play Online Draft



An additional outlay this year could be the option to purchase a premium version of the Season Pass, but for now, we will go with the other methods.




Best way t…
articles.title: EA FC 25 Ultimate Edition: Best ways to spend 4600 FC Points

articles.author: Jamie Moorcroft-Sharp
articles.description:
Following the release of Helldivers 2's 60-day update, players seem pretty happy with the buffs and changes that have been brought to the game. The one weapon fans have latched onto isn't a primary, secondary, or Stratagem, though. It's the Thermite Grenade. 


The buff to Helldivers 2's Thermite Grenade in this 60-day update sounds like a mistake, but I believe it's very deliberate. Prior to the update, the Thermite Grenade would attach to enemies, give them a little tickle, and warm them up with a spark of fire when it exploded. Now, it scorches foes before causing a colossal explosion that can crack open a Bile Titan's carapace and spill its gooey innards all over a planet's surface. 


You're going to need sunglasses for this one


Screenshot by Destructoid


The official patch notes f…
articles.title: Helldivers 2’s ridiculous Thermite Grenade buff is the real star of the 60-day update

articles.author: Jamie Moorcroft-Sharp
articles.description:
Following the reveal of the first piece of concept art and details for the next Battlefield entry, fans are reminding each other to avoid jumping on the hype train. This community feels like it's been burned before with past entries, and now "no pre-orders" has become its motto. 


The first piece of concept art for the next Battlefield game was revealed in an exclusive with IGN. In the accompanying interview piece, Head of Respawn & Group GM for EA Studios Vince Zampella pointed to Battlefield 3 and Battlefield 4 as the peaks of the franchise's modern era shooters. While that's encouraging and exciting news, fans remain skeptical and are trying to hold each other accountable to avoid creating an uncontrollable hype train. 


Don't get carried away


Image via EA


Zampella doesn't announc…
articles.title: ‘No pre-orders’: Battlefield fans are wary of hopping on the hype train for the newest one right away

articles.author: Madison Benson
articles.description:
LEGO Fortnite's Lost Isles is all about finding dinosaurs, exploring the jungle, and fighting against pirates. However, if you search long enough, you might spot a little banana character next to a small village square marker.


While it may not look like much now, this place known as NaN'er Hamlet or NaNa Village is where most of this area's fun comes from. Here's how to find NaNa Village in LEGO Fortnite.


NaNa Village location in LEGO Fortnite


The exact spawn location of NaNa Village, known in-game as NaN'er Hamlet, differs with every world seed. Although the Lost Isles' land masses don't change, the spawn spots for Klombos, various NPCs, and NaNa village do. Although using a set seed will guarantee you find it in the same location every time, looking for it on a random world means you'll have to run around Lost Isle until you spot it.


Screenshot by Destructoid


Fortunately, there's some good and bad news. The good news is that the actual appearance of the NaN'er Hamlet never changes. The bad news is that it's a small village square statue with one character, Bananthony, next to it. Considering Lost Isles' size, you might have to search for a while. 


Bananthony and the NaNa Village marker can spawn in the jungle, on a beach's coastline, or in random plains biomes around Lost Isle. Although plenty of random buildings will spawn around the area, NaN'er Hamlet is the only place that specifically spawns a village square and Bananthony. Watch for his colorful appearance, the village square structure, and its peculiar dirt patch to help you spot it. Otherwise, you'll need plenty of luck or a custom world seed to make the search easier.


Once you find NaN'er Hamlet, you can speak to Bananthony and interact with the village square marker to begin upgrading this little settlement, much like you would with any other village or the Rebel Outpost from the Star Wars event.

The post Where to find the NaNa Village in LEGO Fortnite appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Where to find the NaNa Village in LEGO Fortnite

articles.author: Kristina Ebanez
articles.description:
The Lost Isles harnesses many unique characters that can either be dangerous or friendly. Of all of them, Haven is one of the most helpful allies to set you on the best path. Here's how to find Haven in LEGO Fortnite.


Where to find Haven in LEGO Fortnite


You can find Haven by upgrading your Lost Isle village to Level 2 or creating a new world in LEGO Fortnite. For a quick and easy route, use the second option to travel to Haven's Village automatically. Select Cozy or Survival when setting up a world; you should interact with the character immediately afterward.


Screenshot by Destructoid


Those who don't want to start a new file can use the Bus Station's fast-travel to reach Lost Isle. Set up a base there and upgrade it to trigger Haven's appearance. If she doesn't show up, try to level it up again to, hopefully, produce her spawn. Once you speak to Haven in LEGO Fortnite, she'll want a place to stay. Upgrade your Village Level to meet her requirements.


Haven will enlist you in a few more tasks to better acquaint you with Lost Isles, including the acquisition of the new Mahogany Wood. You can also claim rewards from the Best Friend Klombo task, earning you Studs for the Tropical Treasures LEGO Pass.


How to tame a Klombo in LEGO Fortnite


Once you've completed the Talk to Haven quest, you'll unlock the Tame a Klombo objective. To complete this task, head to the Jungle and give Klomberries to the Klombo to gain its trust. 


Image via Epic Games


Klomberries are relatively easy to find, especially if you're at Haven's Village. Just be on the lookout for some light blue berries and save some for the Klombo. After you've tamed it, you can start riding it to travel across Lost Isles.

The post How to talk to Haven in LEGO Fortnite appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to talk to Haven in LEGO Fortnite

articles.author: Cameron Woolsey
articles.description:
The Feather Cluster is filled with some of the toughest challenges yet. It makes sense that the Lost Galaxy exits are a bit tougher to find. If you're trying to unlock the Djinny of the Lamp Lost Galaxy in Astro Bot, you've come to the right place.


Djinny of the Lamp is the first of two levels in the Feather Cluster to host a Lost Galaxy exit. The exit is also the most cleverly disguised compared to the others. At least, that's how I feel. Here's a clue: If you're looking for the Djinny exit, it's wise to think on your feet.


The Lost Galaxy exit is at the end of the Djinny of the Lamp level. You'll first need to beat the Djinny boss battle, leading you to a small arena that includes both exits. Obviously, you'll want to ignore the primary exit. Where we're going is much higher.


Scree…
articles.title: How to unlock Djinny of the Lamp Lost Galaxy in Astro Bot

articles.author: Jamie Moorcroft-Sharp
articles.description:
Project T, a PvE co-op shooter set in the Dead by Daylight universe, has been canceled. Developer Midwinter Games cites "unsatisfactory overall results" following a deep analysis from internal risk assessment and commercial teams. 


Midwinter Games initially sought feedback for Project T from players who signed up for its early Insider Program to ensure the game was on track to deliver. While many players provided positive responses in feedback surveys following the few playtests Project T had, it wasn't enough to counteract the negative feedback or make the game a viable commercial product. 


Lost in The Backwaters


Screenshot by Destructoid


The above statement was sent to everyone in the Project T Insider Program. It explains how the team was able to get valuable insight into the ga…
articles.title: Dead by Daylight PvE shooter Project T is canceled following ‘unsatisfactory results’ from playtests

articles.author: Sourav Banik
articles.description:
The Lizard Doggo is a friendly creature and tameable companion in Satisfactory 1.0. The adorable, orange reptile has more going for it than just being a little cutie, as the Lizard Doggo can find and deliver helpful items back to your base.


The Lizard Doggo is willing to do some of the work on your behalf, albeit not anything massive, but this pal can collect several resources while you focus on the more important base-building tasks. 


Taming a Lizard Doggo in Satisfactory for gathering help


It's not a difficult task, but you'll need a few resources to tame a Lizard Doggo. If you're looking to make one of these critters a pet in Satisfactory, all you need to do is:



Have Paleberries in your inventory


Find a Lizard Doggo and toss a few berries in front of it


Let the creature approach on its own and eat 


While it's snacking, press the E button to pet the doggo



Once it's done eating and starts approaching you, it means it has been tamed. The process is quite simple and you can get a Lizard Doggo pretty early in the game.


Screenshot by Destructoid


A tamed Lizard Doggo collects and delivers items to you


So, now that you've got a pal, what can it do? Here is a list of a few items that a tamed Lizard Doggo can collect and bring to you:



Alien Organs


Cable


Caterium Ore


Coal


Cup


Limestone


Motor


Mycelia


Paleberry


Power Slugs (Blue, Yellow, Purple)


Raw Quartz


SAM Ore


Sulfur


Uranium



Out of all these items, SAM Ores are some of the rarest items you can find in Satisfactory 1.0, and collecting them requires a lot of effort. This is why players consider this resource for late-game phases for building structures such as an Alien Power Augmenter.

The post How to tame a Lizard Doggo in Satisfactory 1.0 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to tame a Lizard Doggo in Satisfactory 1.0

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
Capcom has released a fresh update for Dragon’s Dogma 2. In addition to some pretty healthy tweaks, they’ve also thrown in a casual mode in case you want a softer journey.


Actually, taking a look at casual mode, it doesn’t seem massively easier. Here are the defining features, as per the patch notes:



Reduced inn fees for staying at an inn.


Reduced price of Ferrystones.


More difficult for weight carried to become "Heavy" or "Very Heavy."


Less Stamina expended when dashing outside of battle.


Loss gauge will not increase when selecting "Load from Last Save" after the Arisen dies.


Pawns will recover from dragonsplague without a "devastating calamity" occurring, even if the symptoms progress to a terminal stage.



That’s not nothing, but some of the tweaks are weirdly specific. It’s easier, but it’s not exactly dumbing things down to an unreasonable level. I wonder if there are less specific changes they aren’t telling us upfront, like a change in damage given/taken.


Speaking of oddly specific, the rest of the patch notes seem like that. A port crystal being added to Bakbattahl seems like the most exciting addition, since it will be a massive convenience. Aside from that, there are things like new idle animations and new items that can be traded with the Dragonforged. It’s nothing spectacular outside the new difficulty.


There are a lot of balance changes to vocations, as well. It’s a lot to take in, so I’m going to direct you to the patch notes again for the specific details. There are also a tonne of bug fixes. I didn’t notice very many issues when I played it back around its release, but this looks like a lot.


Dragon’s Dogma 2 is available now on PS5, Xbox Series X|S, PC. The described patch is available today.

The post New Dragon’s Dogma 2 patch includes casual difficulty, if you’re feeling filthy appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: New Dragon’s Dogma 2 patch includes casual difficulty, if you’re feeling filthy

articles.author: Madison Benson
articles.description:
Fortnite has numerous energy weapons that have been released throughout the years, with Chapter 5 having its fair share that has come and gone with each passing week. They have ups and downs but are worth getting your hands on for their sheer damage output and unique abilities.


During Chapter 5, Season 4's weekly and seasonal quests, you'll also find objectives to damage enemies with specific energy weapons. Fortunately, they're easy to find once you learn a few special locations.


Where to find and damage enemies with energy weapons in Fortnite


Fortnite Chapter 5, Season 4 has two energy weapons you can use for your quests:



Stark Industries Energy Rifle


Iron Man's Combat Kit



You can purchase both from Iron Man, who roams south of Grim Gate near the armory delivery spot and wi…
articles.title: How to find energy weapons in Fortnite Chapter 5, Season 4

articles.author: Jamie Moorcroft-Sharp
articles.description:
Wizards of the Coast has revealed yet another Ghostbusters and Secret Lair crossover for Magic: The Gathering. We've had an entire set dedicated to Slimer, but this one focuses on the animated TV series, something many of us grew up watching. 


First, we had Secret Lair x Ghostbusters: Slimer! as a Superdrop, and now we have Secret Lair X The Real Ghostbusters as another. This second set looks at various episodes from throughout The Real Ghostbusters TV show, containing hand-picked moments that fit well with the mechanics of the cards they've been used for. The artwork is reminiscent of the original show, too. It's a nice touch I love as both a fan who watched the series growing up and someone who enjoys Magic: The Gathering today. 


Every card in the Secret Lair x The Real Ghostbusters …
articles.title: All cards in the Secret Lair x The Real Ghostbusters Superdrop

articles.author: Darrus Myles
articles.description:
The Great Vault is one of the best sources of high-end loot in WoW: The War Within, but earning the potential rewards you can get from it requires some effort on your part. Here's how the Great Vault works, and how you can earn all the possible loot choices from it.


How to Unlock Great Vault Rewards in WoW: The War Within


Although added several years ago in one of WoW's many expansions, the Great Vault continues to act as the great counterbalance toward unlucky RNG. Even if you do everything you can in The War Within every week, you may never see the loot you're searching for drop. As such, the Great Vault ensures that all players can earn at least one high-end piece of loot every week if they are participating in the expansions of various end-game activities.





The Great Vault cont…
articles.title: All The War Within Great Vault Rewards

articles.author: Paula Vaynshteyn
articles.description:
If you’re looking for an energy boost in Disney Dreamlight Valley, then you’re going to need some food and they don’t come much more rewarding than Creamy Garlic Scallops. 


Creamy Garlic Scallops is a 4-star entrée meal which makes up part of the Dreamlight Valley collection of recipes. That means that you don’t need to have the Rift in Time DLC in order to make the recipe. 


How to make Creamy Garlic Scallops in Disney Dreamlight Valley


Image by Destructoid


As a 4-star recipe, you’ll need four ingredients to make Creamy Garlic Scallops:



1 Scallop

A Blue shell which can be found on the shore of Dazzle Beach. A maximum of four will spawn at any time. 




1 Lemon

Foraged from trees in the Forest of Valor or Glade of Trust


Can sometimes be purchased at Goofy’s Stall in the Fore…
articles.title: How to make Creamy Garlic Scallops in Disney Dreamlight Valley

articles.author: Sourav Banik
articles.description:
As you continue expanding your base in the starting regions of Satisfactory 1.0, you'll require more resources and an easy way to do that is by overclocking all the machines at your disposal.


By increasing the clock speed of machines, you increase their efficiency to produce more resources in less time. The best thing about this feature is that it can double the resources produced from a single piece of machinery and doesn't require you to increase their counts.


How to Overclock in Satisfactory


Screenshot by Destructoid


To unlock Clock speed, you must achieve that through the Power Slugs Research chain in the Molecular Analysis Machine (MAM). You'll need the following items to unlock the Clock speed:



1x Power Shard


50x Iron Plate


50x Wire



To unlock a Power Shard, you have…
articles.title: How to unlock Overclocking in Satisfactory 1.0

articles.author: Filip Galekovic
articles.description:
It's been a heck of an adventure, but Remnant 2 is about to wrap up its post-launch content schedule with the new The Dark Horizon DLC, featuring the Warden character class. Much as was the case with, say, the Ritualist, the Warden is DLC-locked, and their specialty is drones.


More specifically, the Warden archetype is a headlining feature of the upcoming The Dark Horizon DLC, which launches on September 24 for $9.99. The general gist of the DLC is that it follows the exact same formula as its two predecessors, The Forgotten Kingdom and The Awakened King. Whereas these DLCs expanded upon Yaesha and Losomn, respectively, The Dark Horizon is all about N'Erud's horror sci-fi goodness, and the Warden ties into this idea remarkably well.




Remnant 2's Warden archetype is coming as part of T…
articles.title: Remnant 2 shows off the drone-wielding Warden character class

articles.author: Paula Vaynshteyn
articles.description:
If there’s one thing you’re going to need a lot of in Disney Dreamlight Valley, it’s Dream Shards. It’s needed in a lot of quests and crafts, so having a stockpile of this precious resource is never a bad thing. 


It can be hard to figure out where Dream Shards come from, especially if you’ve just begun your adventures in the Valley. Thankfully, there are a few different ways to get Dream Shards, and none of them will cost a single Star Coin. 


How to get Dream Shards in Disney Dreamlight Valley


Image by Destructoid


There are three things that you can do to get Dream Shards:


Digging sparkling holes


At any time, three sparkling holes will spawn in each biome of the Valley. These can be dug up using your Royal Shovel, and will yield either Dream Shards of Night Shards. Regardless o…
articles.title: How to get Dream Shards in Disney Dreamlight Valley

articles.author: Christian Dawson
articles.description:
What game isn't complete without a level that glorifies gambling? Any and all. Personal beliefs aside, Astro Bot does have a fun level replete with dice, chips, slots, and collectibles. Shortly after entering the Serpent Starway, you'll run into the Slo-Mo Casino. Here's where to find each collectible while wearing the PS VR headset.


Where to find every bot and puzzle piece in Slo-Mo Casino


Slo-Mo Casino Bots


Image by Destructoid


Bot 1: Our first bot is found atop a platform overlooking the dolphin fountain. Once Ecco and his friends are at the pinnacle of their leap, freeze time and hop across their backs to reach the wayward bot.


Screenshot by Destructoid


Bot 2: Once you enter the casino proper, you'll be greeted with four slot machines. The slot machine all the way on the ri…
articles.title: All Slo-Mo Casino collectibles in Astro Bot

articles.author: Paula Vaynshteyn
articles.description:
If you’re a Disney fan looking for a new mobile game to wind down at the end of the day with, then I’ve got good news: Disney Pixel RPG finally has a release date. 


Disney Pixel RPG will be releasing on Android and iOS on October 7, and pre-registrations for the mobile game have already surpassed 600,000. 




Once the game is live, you’ll be able to customize your own character and then set off across a variety of different worlds to discover the characters who reside there. You’ll be accompanied throughout the story by Mickey Mouse and friends, so you’ll never have to face any challenge alone.


Completing objectives in Disney Pixel RPG will unlock new outfits and customization options, as well as new characters who will fight on your side. Fighting can either be casual, with the option to send out your fighters to complete quests and objectives while you’re getting on with life in the real world, or you can dive right into the action and take control.


Image via GungHo Online 


So far, various characters have been revealed including Baymax, Winnie the Pooh, Genie, Maleficent, and even Judy from Zootopia, and all of them are depicted in adorable pixel format. All of these characters and many more can be sent out on Expeditions, which will take place when you’re not playing, to bring back resources and materials.


I think it’s safe to say that I have a soft spot for Disney, pixel games, and RPGs, so this is just a perfect combination of three things that I love. If you want to join me on October 7 and neglect real life in favor of this pixel world, then you can pre-register for Disney Pixel RPG now.

The post Disney Pixel RPG launches on Android and iOS on October 7 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Disney Pixel RPG launches on Android and iOS on October 7

articles.author: Filip Galekovic
articles.description:
It's been a long time coming, but Bethesda's finally released a proper Deep Dive discussing Starfield: Shattered Space in appropriate detail. It's a solid showcase, but it's also a potential disappointment in one key way: it seems to whitewash the Va'ruun into regular ol' spacefolk, with Chunks stores and all.


I'm sure not everyone is going to be quite as taken aback as I've been, but the fact that there's an honest-to-goodness Chunks storefront in the middle of Dazra gave me whiplash. Don't get me wrong: Shattered Space still looks very interesting if you're a Starfield fan, and the aesthetic on show is definitely on-point. It's just that I was a fair bit disappointed to learn that the Va'ruun really are every bit as ordinary as everyone else in the galaxy.




Starfield: Shattered Spac…
articles.title: Starfield: Shattered Space is all about pockets of gravitational anomalies, dimensional horrors, and cultist whitewashing

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
If you are waiting eagerly for EA FC 25 to go live on early access, there's a great way to enjoy all the content even earlier.


Early access goes live globally on September 20, and it begins at midnight local time for all console users. On PC, the early access begins at 5 a.m. BST worldwide, so the start time will vary based on your region. Since the game launch depends on regional timings on consoles, there's a popular way to start playing earlier if you're on Xbox.


Disclaimer: This method only works on Xbox consoles. Readers are advised to try it at their own risk.


EA FC 25 switching region to New Zealand guide


The method mentioned here isn't actually locked to New Zealand, and you can switch the region to any nation where Xbox is available. But switching to New Zealand makes more…
articles.title: How to play EA FC 25 early by changing to New Zealand region?

articles.author: Sourav Banik
articles.description:
Unlike some other games, the Map doesn't come unlocked right out of the bat in Satisfactory 1.0, and you need to complete a few steps before reaching there.


For a huge open-world game boasting features and resources to collect such as Satisfactory, the map plays one of the most important roles in tracking your progress. It gives you an idea of all the areas you've discovered so far and mark down places for, you know, future reference.


How to get the Map in Satisfactory


Screenshot by Destructoid


To unlock the map, you first need to complete the Tier 1 Field Research Milestone. This comes right after completing the Onboarding process or tutorial.


Like the Onboarding process, the Field Research Milestone also costs a few resources, and here's a rundown of it:



300x Wire


300x Screw


100x Iron Plate



These resources are pretty easy to collect during the early game, and it's best if you set up an automated system including Miners, Storage Containers, Smelters, Conveyor Belts, Constructors, and a lot of power.


How to access the Map


Once the map gets unlocked, you can access it by pressing the 'M' button. The shortcut also shows up on the bottom-right of the screen along with other shortcuts, so you won't miss out on it.


You can then place different markers for different locations. Let's say you've chosen Grass Fields as a starting location and discovered a pure SAM Ore spot nearby, you can mark it down for later.


You can zoom in between 1x to 8x by either dragging the slider on the bottom-right corner of the screen or using the scroll wheel.

The post How to unlock the Map in Satisfactory 1.0 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to unlock the Map in Satisfactory 1.0

articles.author: Joseph Luster
articles.description:
Darksiders II: Deathinitive Edition is nearly 10 years old at this point, but it's finally making its way to current-gen consoles. THQ Nordic announced plans to release the PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S versions on October 15, 2024. 


You'll be able to hop back in Death's ethereal saddle for $29.99. Those who already own the PS4 or Xbox One versions, however, can snag Deathinitive Edition as a free upgrade. For everyone else, there's a half-off discount in place for pre-orders until October 14. 


Previewed below, the PS5 and Xbox Series version of Darksiders II adds 4K resolution, ray tracing, and enhanced lighting. There are also haptic feedback features in place for PS5's DualSense controller, and both versions have improved loading times. 




Darksiders II was fantastic when it debuted on PC, PlayStation 3, and Xbox 360 way back in 2012, and the upgraded edition has been a great way to play for nearly as long. Beyond the upgrades unique to current consoles, Deathinitive Edition adds in all the downloadable content and some fine-tuning to the loot distribution and game balance. Other aspects — including character, and environmental visuals — have also been tweaked since the initial launch. 


Most of all, I respect THQ Nordic for sticking with a title as silly as Deathinitive Edition for so long. Hopefully, the game itself holds up better than the name in 2024. I've been itching to dive back into this series for a while now, so this is as good an excuse as any to do so.  

The post Darksiders II: Deathinitive Edition upgrades to Xbox Series, PS5 on October 15 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Darksiders II: Deathinitive Edition upgrades to Xbox Series, PS5 on October 15

articles.author: Kristina Ebanez
articles.description:
Get ready for the ultimate showdown in Fortnite's new limited-time mode, where Marvel's Avengers clash with Doctor Doom. The thrill of this battle is heightened as you'll wield a variety of Marvel-inspired weapons from both the hero and villain sides.


We're here to guide you through this exhilarating journey to help you dominate Fortnite's Day of Doom LTM.  


How to play and win Fortnite Day of Doom LTM


In the Discover section, you'll find Day of Doom, a Fortnite 16v16 battle riddled with chaos. You'll join two sides: Marvel's Avengers or Doom's Henchmen. If you're a Henchman, you'll need to find six Arcane Artifacts, gradually spawning throughout the match. Collect all of them to prohibit respawns for the hero side, and knock out anyone who stands in your way. As for the Avengers, th…
articles.title: Fortnite Day of Doom LTM: How to play, all loadouts, and end date

articles.author: Daniel Morris
articles.description:
It has been over a year now since the launch of Baldur's Gate 3, and its modding community is starting to come into its own. No aspect of the game remains untouched as talented modders aim to perfect Larian's legendary CRPG with additions of their own.


This includes the weapons. Sure, Baldur's Gate 3 has a lot of weapon variation throughout the game, but there can always be more. Use these 10 BG3 weapon mods to really spice up your adventure through Faerûn.


Elven Weaponry - Longbows and Quivers


Image via kharneth/Nexus Mods


Elven Weaponry - Longbows and Quivers is the first in a long line of mods on this list by creator kharneth, and there's a reason for that. This mod takes the base game's lackluster longbows and transforms them, adding new ones with edited and custom models of th…
articles.title: 10 best Baldur’s Gate 3 weapon mods

articles.author: Madison Benson
articles.description:
As originally reported by Variety in an interview with EA's vice president and The Sims general manager, Kate Gorman, Maxis has multiple plans for the Sims franchise, including running another playtest for Project Rene in Fall 2024 and introducing Creator Kits to The Sims 4. 


Moving forward, Gorman says things will be a little different. When asked specifically if there will not be a Sims 5, Gorman says, "It's not 'Sims 5' as a replacement for 4."


During the interview, Gorman elaborates on multiple games in the franchise, with The Sims 5 being the main discussion topic initially and Maxis' plans to avoid making it "'Sims 5' as a replacement for '4.'"


Gorman clarifies further in the post: "What this means is that we will continue to bring HD simulation experience and what people would…
articles.title: EA says Project Rene won’t replace The Sims 4, as it announces a new playtest

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
EA has announced that the next game in the skate. series is scheduled to drop into Early Access in 2025. This will be the first entry in the series since skate. 3 in 2010. Shortly after, EA laid off most of the developer’s staff and shut down the studio. Last we heard, Deran Chung and Chris Parry who worked on the original run of games, are part of the team handling the new skate.


I haven’t really been keeping up with the development of the new skate. (which is apparently just called skate.). I think I lost interest when it was announced that it would be free-to-play and multiplayer focused. Actually, repeating that still sticks in my craw since my wish for a new skate. game did not include GaaS.




If you’re down for that sort of thing, EA has been holding playtests since 2022 to collect player feedback. The developer has said that there will be no loot boxes, no maps locked behind paywalls, and no pay-to-win. So, that’s maybe comforting, but that still leaves cosmetics as microtransactions. We’ll have to wait and see.


I loved the skate. series. I love Tony Hawk's Pro Skater, as well, but they’re two completely different approaches to skateboarding. skate. feels a lot more authentic. You try and find the perfect line to build the most gnar gnar combo possible. The stick-flicking controls gave everything a more tactile feel.


But really, I have no interest in a live service multi-player game. Thankfully, I still have the original three games on PS3, so I can always turn to them. They’ve aged well.


skate. is coming to early access on 2025. More details to come.

The post New skate. game kickflips into early access in 2025 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: New skate. game kickflips into early access in 2025

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Several Internet Providers, including Verizon, have asked the U.S. Supreme Court to grant Cox Communications' appeal in a landmark piracy liability case. The ISPs stress that the current ruling creates "extortionate pressure" that puts innocent subscribers at risk. A separate brief from Boston College Law School Professor Alfred Yen, also urges the Supreme Court to take on the case. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ISPs Back Cox’s Supreme Court Petition to Counter “Extortionate” Piracy Liability Pressure

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Premier League fans searching for an illegal stream of the Spurs v Arsenal match on Sunday may have received an unexpected intervention. As part of the BeStreamWise anti-piracy campaign, would-be pirates on X and Reddit were reportedly gifted a link to a stream, but not of the match. The replacement featured a real stream made entirely of water, protecting the viewer from malware and potentially curing them of piracy forever. For those who missed out, there are other things to try.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Fake Streams ‘Save’ Premier League Pirates, Security Tips Can Save More

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Earlier this year, a Hawaiian district court blocked movie companies' efforts to unmask alleged BitTorrent pirates using a DMCA subpoena 'shortcut'. The filmmakers requested the court to reconsider its position, but without success. Undeterred, the filmmakers are now petitioning the Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit to review the lower court's findings.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Movie Companies Take DMCA Subpoena ‘Shortcut’ Dispute to Court of Appeals

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
British musician Eddy Grant has prevailed in his copyright infringement lawsuit against Donald Trump and his 2020 campaign team over their infringing use of the iconic track 'Electric Avenue'. After consuming four years of Grant's life, the case turned on a fair use defense; under scrutiny of the court, it effortlessly failed to convince on any of the four factors that combine to indicate a permitted, non-infringing use of a copyright work.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Eddy Grant Wins: Trump’s ‘Fair Use’ of ‘Electric Avenue’ Was Anything But

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Every week we take a close look at the most pirated movies on torrent sites. What are pirates downloading? 'The Crow' tops the chart, followed by 'Deadpool & Wolverine'. '' completes the top three.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Top 10 Most Pirated Movies of The Week – 09/16/2024

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
In recent years Brazil's telecoms agency has claimed significant success in its mission to prevent pirate set-top boxes from accessing premium content. Whether Anatel  is feeling a little vulnerable, or would simply like some new blocking ideas, is up for debate. However, in roughly ten days' time, hackers will descend on São Paulo for a two-day hackathon. Cash prizes await those who manage to disable pirate IPTV devices to the extent they can no longer communicate with their owners.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Hackers Invited to Pirate IPTV Blocking Hackathon to Silence Illegal Devices

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Initially reported as technical issues, in September 2023 file-hosting platform Uptobox watched as its servers went offline. In reality, they were being taken away due to a criminal complaint filed by Hollywood, Canal+, Apple, Amazon, and other rightsholders. Since then, the owners of Uptobox have turned to the legal system, hoping to salvage whatever they can. On Thursday, a Paris court informed the defendants that their servers will not be returned.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Seized Uptobox Servers Won’t Be Returned, Requests Ruled Inadmissible

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
A court in Paris, France, has ordered major Internet providers to block 98 domain names used by popular book download portal Z-Library.  The order comes in response to a complaint from the National Publishers Union (SNE), but the victory may be bittersweet. Many of the listed domain names were previously seized by U.S. authorities, and expanding the current order could prove time-consuming.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: French Pirate Site Blocking Order Targets Expired and Seized Z-Library Domains

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Serie A CEO Luigi De Siervo's dramatic take on Italian football's piracy problems isn't new, likewise his insistence that only coercive action will produce results. "Football is being killed," he said in a recent interview. "However, at the end of this battle we will win. Because it's either them or us." How this will be achieved isn't clear. Pirates keep jumping to new servers and if promises are kept, fans are getting sued next.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ‘Parasitic’ IPTV Piracy is Killing Football, “It’s Them or Us” Says Serie A CEO

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Anti-piracy coalition ACE reports that Egyptian law enforcement authorities have shut down Laroza, the 'largest' pirate site in the Middle East and North Africa. Two of the alleged operators were arrested. The piracy ring operated dozens of domains and generated millions of pageviews per month. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ACE Helps Egypt to Dismantle the Region’s Largest Piracy Site

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Dutch anti-piracy group BREIN has submitted its recommendations for the EU's Counterfeiting and Piracy Watchlist. The group notes that its court-ordered site blocking efforts appear to be paying off but several intermediaries could be more cooperative. This includes domain registrar Namecheap, which refuses to block customers' sites without a U.S.  court order. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Namecheap Flagged for EU ‘Piracy Watchlist’ After Failing to Block Infringing Sites

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
UK broadcaster Sky has submitted its report to the European Commission providing its overview of the latest piracy threats. These submissions guide the EC as it updates its 'Counterfeit and Piracy Watch List' and this time around some rightsholders want intermediaries to receive special attention. Sky's submission dedicates more space to Cloudflare than even the most egregious pirate IPTV hosting providers, and Facebook doesn't get off lightly either.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Sky Calls Out IPTV Piracy Facilitators, Including Cloudflare & Facebook

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Verizon is pushing back against a copyright infringement lawsuit filed by several major music labels, arguing that inaction in response to piracy notices doesn't equate to liability. Citing a recent Supreme Court ruling, Verizon is calling for an end to these "lucrative" piracy liability lawsuits. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Verizon Asks Court to Dismiss Music Labels’ Piracy Liability Lawsuit

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The Motion Picture Association (MPA) has submitted its latest overview of piracy threats to the European Commission. The submission details many of the usual targets, including torrent sites, streaming portals, and piracy apps. The main theme, however, concerns the role of third-party intermediaries. According to the MPA, these companies should take more responsibility, whether they like it or not.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Hollywood and Netflix Report Piracy Threats to the EU, Call for ‘Intermediary’ Action

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Swedish anti-piracy group Rights Alliance has just announced the prosecution of a man allegedly behind pirate IPTV service 'Ghost Farmer TV'. The case is one of several initiated in Sweden in recent years but, for rightsholders, a few prosecutions simply isn't enough. Sweden's Justice Minister considers calls from anti-piracy groups to start going after subscribers premature. That said, the government isn't ruling it out.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Pirate IPTV Arrests in Sweden Should Include Users, Rightsholders Tell Govt.

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
A study published this week by researchers in Spain shows how the intent to subscribe to a streaming platform is affected when potential subscribers are presented with stimuli such as advertising-based discounts, loyalty-based discounts, and prosocial anti-piracy messages. When direct threats enter the equation, does the fear factor help or hinder the intent to subscribe?
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Threatening Anti-Piracy Messaging Fails to Stimulate Intent to Subscribe

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Sports piracy has been on the rise and pay-per-view events, in particular, are widely accessed through illegal channels. Turki Alalshikh, an advisor at the Royal Court in Saudi Arabia, made a suggestion this week to drastically reduce PPV pricing to cut piracy. American boxer Chris Algieri has an even more drastic idea: "Make it free," he says. UFC CEO Dana White, meanwhile, sees more mileage in prosecuting pirates. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ‘Make Pay-Per-View Access to Boxing Events Free to Fight Piracy’

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
KimCartoon, a pirate site dedicated to all things cartoon, surprised users this week with a sudden "That's All Folks" before shutting itself down. With an estimated 120 million visits over the last 12 months alone, KimCartoon was a very busy site and with that kind of traffic, life can get complicated. The site's operator says the site was shut down "due to DMCA" but, after weathering many storms over the years, maybe there's a little bit more to it than that.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: That’s All Folks: KimCartoon’s 120m Visit Piracy Caper Ends in a DMCA Disaster

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Danish police have arrested a 39-year-old man who shared nude scenes of more than a hundred female actors through Reddit and porn sites. The suspect has been charged with copyright infringement. While posting small clips from movies or TV-shows typically doesn't result in criminal action, taking nude clips out of context is considered a breach of actors' and filmmakers' integrity.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Man Arrested for Sharing Copyright Infringing Nude Scenes Through Reddit

Support for Pixel 9 Series Devices
You can now test your apps on the Google Pixel 9 series device configurations. Android Studio and the latest Android Emulator now have device definitions for the Pixel 9, Pixel 9 Pro, Pixel 9 Pro XL, and the Pixel 9 Pro Fold, enabling you to validate your apps on these virtual devices to ensure they react correctly to a variety of screen sizes and device types. You should use API 35 with the Pixel 9 AVDs to ensure the best experience and access to the latest platform features.

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Skoro dokonalý horor. Nepředvídatelný, ale přesto celkem logický děj. Hutná atmosféra, tvořená novými permutacemi starých klišé, bez nutnosti uchylovat se k lekačkám a stříkající krvi. Nepotřebuji to vidět znovu, ale dlouho jsem něco tak kvalitního neviděl a nevšiml jsem si mnoha věcí, které by se daly zlepšit. (Ilča 80 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Duše prokletých [Oddity] - 90 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Velmi příjemné překvapení. Dobře napsané i zahrané scény mezi lidmi, kterým poněkud nefunguje komunikace a navzájem si připadají "trochu divní". Fungovalo by to dobře jako normální (nehororové) současné drama. Ke konci se to trochu zvrhne do standardní vyvražďovačky, ale pořád výrazný nadprůměr s několika výbornými scenáristickými nápady. Neviděl jsem dánský originál. (Ilča 60 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Nepřivolávej nic zlého [Speak no Evil] (2024) - 80 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)

articles.title: A co budete vy hrát 21. října?

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Čtyři lidoopové chodí přírodou, hýkají, a stane se jim pět nebo šest věcí, které stojí za zmínku. Potenciálně dojemná patnáctiminutová hříčka, která byla zcela nesmyslně natažena na 90 minut, následkem čehož se její rozvleklost téměř nedá fyzicky vydržet. (Ilča 5 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Chlupatá rodinka [Sasquatch Sunset] - 40 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Po svěžích "Chudáčcích" je tohle návrat k intelektuální artovosti "Humra" nebo "Posvátného jelena". Výborní herci, výborná atmosféra jednotlivých scén, ale velmi brzy jsem se přestal snažit chápat, co si z toho mám vlastně odnést. Mírným pozitivem je, že to jsou tři oddělené minipříběhy (se stejnými herci) a ne jeden dlouhý. (Ilča 60 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Milé laskavosti [Kinds of Kindness] - 60 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Surrealistický artfilm, který by byl možná originální před 70 lety a zajímavě retro před 30 lety, ale dnes je především nudný a nemá k ničemu co říct. Je chvályhodné, pokud tento film pomůže zlepšit podmínky v dětských domovech, ale bez hromady doprovodných informací není ani zřejmé, že má mít nějaký takový účel. Z toho, co se děje na plátně, nevyplývá nic víc než "Podívejte, co se honí v mé šílené hlavě, zajímá vás to?" Mě osobně ne. (Ilča 20 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Amerikánka - 30 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Dobří herci, dobrá atmosféra, slušně řemeslně natočeno, občas dobrý vtip, ale scénář není nic moc a pokud o titulní postavě nic nevíte, je to místy dost zmatené (kdo je kdo, proč dělá to, co dělá, a proč by vás to mělo zajímat). Až na konci zjistíte, že je to jen polovina příběhu a na zbytek budete muset jít do kina za půl roku, což bych se odvážil označit za podraz na diváka. (Ilča 60 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Miki - 60 %
